评论概述: One size Up and Careful Laundering
评论详情: I usually wear a size L for tops which give me room for bust line and hips. I read the reviews, mostly negative. I heeded what others said about this top.  The XL was exactly right and after wearing it twice, I filled my washer for a small wash having put in my detergent while filling. I let the washer begin to agitate and then stopped it. I then dipped my top up and down several times and spun out the water and put the top back in for rinse and spinning. Finally, I hung the top to dry. It fits exactly like the top did when first worn. I’m very pleased with this cotton and linen blend for summer.
